lead_paragraph: Winger Chris Ashton's decision to move from Saracens to French side Toulon next season is not right and could restrict his development, according to the English Premiership club's director of rugby Mark McCall.

headline.print_headline: Saracens Wing Ashton's Toulon Switch Not Right-McCall
headline.main: Saracens Wing Ashton's Toulon Switch Not Right-McCall

snippet: Winger Chris Ashton's decision to move from Saracens to French side Toulon next season is not right and could restrict his development, according to the English Premiership club's director of rugby Mark McCall....
